title: Crime Alert 04.19.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 04.19.19
description:
Serial Killer who confessed to 93 murders, draws 10 new sketches of his alleged victims for FBI investigators. Colorado Police reopen an investigation into an unsolved 1975 homicide. New Jersey Superior Court Judge faces a three-month suspension for telling an alleged sexual assault victim one way to stop intercourse is to close her legs.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
